content:
Yip~ I often see you walking around with your fishing rod like that.
Have you started treating it as an extension of your arm?
Sometimes I do the same thing with my umbrella... well, you know what I mean.
info: 幻雪关于玩家手持鱼竿闲聊（教程向）_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I believe I heard the swift movement of fish swimming away.
Ah, so you're holding a fishing rod!
Next time, you might want to move more stealthily.
info: 幻雪关于玩家手持鱼竿闲聊（教程向）_幻雪流程闲聊1
